1.0.1.en: Fixed multiple cars support. App store fixes.

1.1.0.en: Bluelink (Hyundai) driver added. Kia PHEV support added. EU, CA, US regions added.

1.2.0.en: Fix dual flow triggers, chager labels, settings and change settings log. Readme and instructions update. Notify device as unavailable on restart. Improved car-active detection. Added ABRP DC fast charger state.

1.3.0.en: Fix target temp setting. Fix target temp scale. Stability improvements. Added command queueing. Added force live via cloud (HTTP GET). Changed forced poll method to GPS.

1.4.0.en: Stability improvements. Fix pairing. Fix log length. Climate control check engine on. Improved queuing. Added rate limiting. Improved car active detection. Prevent dual Homey active triggering.

1.5.0.en: Added action flow cards for A/C on/off, Defrost on/off, set Temp. Added lat/lon capabilities/flow tokens (repair needed). Fix step 0.5 target temp. Improved pairing.

1.6.0.en: Fix live data from app and flow. Fix condition cards. Added flow cards for car moving, parked, closed&locked.

1.6.1.en: Added short URL for remote force. Improved parked detection. Disable/Enable live data and control from flow (privacy mode).

1.7.0.en: Added Estimated Time To Home (ETTH) and Heading Home (repair needed). Updated icons.

2.0.0.en: App rewrite (repair needed). Added charge on/off. Added Google Directions ETTH. Added flowcards. Added parked address. Removed Heading Home. Improved reverse Geo. bluelinky@5.2.3 kuvork@5.4.4

2.0.1.en: Fix ETTH when just parked. Improved car parked detection. Improved error handling. bluelinky@6.0.0 kuvork@6.0.0-alpha4

2.0.3.en: Fix crash when no batSoc (Kia Soul)

2.0.2.en: Fix crash when no batSoc (Kia Soul)

2.1.0.en: Quick fix not able to login for Kia. Hyundai is WIP. Bluelinky removed. kuvork@6.2.0-alpha.1

2.1.1.en: Quick fix not able to login for Kia and Hyundai. kuvork@6.2.0-alpha.5

2.1.2.en: Improved server info after app start. kuvork@6.2.2

2.2.0.en: Added support for Kia Ceed ICE.
